hero.title: Smart Farming for a
hero.subtitle: Leverage AI-powered crop predictions, real-time analytics, and access quality agricultural products—all in one platform.

features.title: Everything You Need for
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools and resources to maximize your agricultural success
features.aiPredictionDesc: Get accurate crop recommendations based on soil conditions, weather, and historical data.
features.analyticsDesc: Visualize trends, market rates, and yield patterns with interactive dashboards.
features.ecommerceDesc: Shop for quality seeds, fertilizers, equipment, and more at competitive prices.
features.securityDesc: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and encryption.
features.realtimeDesc: Stay informed with live market rates and weather-based recommendations.
features.communityDesc: Connect with fellow farmers and agricultural experts for guidance.

about.title: Empowering Farmers with Modern Technology
about.description1: Agriculture is the backbone of our economy, supporting over 58% of India's population. With changing climate patterns and increasing demand, modern farming techniques have become essential for sustainable growth.
about.description2: AgroSmart bridges the gap between traditional farming wisdom and cutting-edge technology, helping farmers make data-driven decisions that improve yields, reduce costs, and promote environmental sustainability.
about.smartIrrigationDesc: Optimize water usage with precision farming

science.title: The Science Behind
science.subtitle: Understanding the fundamentals of modern agriculture helps farmers make informed decisions that lead to better harvests and sustainable practices.
science.soilHealthDesc: Healthy soil is the foundation of productive agriculture. Regular testing helps optimize nutrient levels and pH balance for maximum crop growth.
science.digitalToolsDesc: Mobile apps and sensors enable real-time monitoring of crop health, weather conditions, and soil moisture levels from anywhere.
science.controlledEnvDesc: Greenhouses and vertical farms allow year-round production with precise control over temperature, humidity, and light.

benefits.title: Why Choose
benefits.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers who have transformed their agricultural practices
benefits.precisionDesc: Use drones, sensors, and AI to monitor crop health and optimize resources
benefits.organicDesc: Learn sustainable practices for healthier crops and higher market value

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes with our easy-to-use platform
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up for free and set up your farm profile with basic details about your land and crops.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Enter soil parameters, location, and current conditions for personalized recommendations.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Receive accurate crop predictions, yield estimates, and market rate forecasts.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Apply insights, track progress, and watch your farm productivity soar.

voice.title: Voice Assistant
voice.tryAgain: Try: 'go to shop', 'proceed to checkout', 'clear my cart', or 'add wheat seeds to cart'
voice.browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support voice recognition
voice.errorMessage: Voice recognition failed. Please try again.

voiceHelp.title: Voice Commands Help
voiceHelp.description: Use these voice commands to navigate and control the app. Click the microphone button and speak clearly.
voiceHelp.tip1: Speak clearly and at a normal pace
voiceHelp.tip2: Use the exact phrases shown for best results
voiceHelp.tip3: Make sure your microphone is enabled and working
